name: clsss3
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), c2))

stmt.origin: syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cfv(ccld, c0)))
stmt.pretty: syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ((cls ` c0)` c1)⊆ c2, ((cls ` c0)` c1)∈(Clsd ` c0))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), c2))

comment: The closure of a subset of a topological space is included in the space. (Contributed by NM, 26-Feb-2007.)
